snippet.title: Shadowgate VR PS VR2 Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase Spring 2025
snippet.description:
Shadowgate VR: The Mines of Mythrok is coming to PS VR2! Get a first look at the new version of the game, set to hit the console soon.

Wishlist Shadowgate VR and read more from Flat2VR: https://linktr.ee/Flat2VRStudiosVRGS

Developed by Zojoi and published by Flat2VR Studios, this fully immersive fantasy adventure transports players deep into the ruins of a lost dwarven kingdom, where danger lurks around every corner. Armed with a sorcerer’s wand and an enchanted shield, you must master elemental magic to unravel devious traps, battle monstrous guardians, and uncover the forgotten history buried beneath the stone. Guided by Odin, your wise (and often exasperated) raven companion, you’ll navigate crumbling passageways, ride breakneck minecarts, and push ever deeper into the abyss—where something dark and powerful waits in the shadows.
